title: Keyboard Macros
body: I was wondering if binding an /all chat message to my ulti is considered bannable. Considering I'm not using it to combo other abilities, I don't see why it would be.

replies.body:
This shouldn't cause any sort of issue. The only thing that would be 'questionable' would be the fact that this message would essentially be a "macro" of sorts. Macros for abilities/items/wards/anything about gameplay can be viewed as giving you an edge and **CAN** be actioned on, but this macro is just for a chat message so it should be fine.

TL;DR you should be fine!
Good, cause I bound "Omae wa mou shindeiru!" to her ultimate, I get a kick out of it every time :>
